title: Finish Project Proposal
description: Complete the project proposal and submit it by the deadline.

title: Update User Interface
description: Revise and improve the user interface based on the feedback.

title: Test Backend API
description: Write test cases and perform testing for the backend API.

title: Prepare Presentation Slides
description: Create engaging presentation slides for the upcoming meeting.

title: Review Code Changes
description: Review and provide feedback on recent code changes.
